content: sitting cat c a lira 2008 aka cat pack attack appliqués - volume 2 yarn aunt lydia s classic cotton crochet thread - size 10 color copper mist hook size 9 1 25 mm gauge not important for this project abbreviations chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet stitch st stitches sts skip skip single_crochet decrease scdec notes scdec is also known as decrease = single_crochet 2 together as follows insert hook in st indicated yo pull loop through insert hook in next st indicated yo pull loop through all loops on hook finished height 1 ½ but will vary with gauge pattern starts at bottom of cat s right hand ear green arrow in chart abbreviations chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet stitch st stitches sts skip skip single_crochet decrease scdec sitting cat right hand ear 1 chain 3 skip chain next to hook slip_stitch into next chain single_crochet in next chain top of head and left hand ear 2 chain 5 skip chain next to hook slip_stitch into next chain single_crochet in next chain leave last 2 chs unworked for now chain 2 turn head 2 skip 1st single_crochet of previous row single_crochet in each of next 3 sts 2sc in next st chain 2 turn 3 skip 1st single_crochet single_crochet into each of next 5 sts chain 2 turn 4 scdec across 1st and 2nd single_crochet single_crochet in each of next 2 sts scdec across next single_crochet and turning chain 2 of previous row chain 2 turn neck 5 scdec across next 2 sts twice chain 2 turn body 6 single_crochet in 1st st single_crochet in next st 2sc in next st turning chain 2 of previous row chain 2 turn 7 2sc in 1st st single_crochet in each of next 3 sts chain 2 turn 8 skip 1st st single_crochet in each of next 4 sts 2sc in next st turning chain 2 of prev row next st turning chain 2 prev row chain 2 turn 11 single_crochet in 1st st single_crochet in each of next 7 sts single_crochet in next st turning chain 2 prev row chain 2 turn 12 skip 1st st
